member.name: D2D1_BLEND_DESCRIPTION
member.summary: Defines a blend description to be used in a particular blend transform.

member.name: D2D1_BLEND_DESCRIPTION.sourceBlend
member.summary: Specifies the first RGB data source and includes an optional preblend operation.

member.name: D2D1_BLEND_DESCRIPTION.destinationBlend
member.summary: Specifies the second RGB data source and includes an optional preblend operation.

member.name: D2D1_BLEND_DESCRIPTION.blendOperation
member.summary: Specifies how to combine the RGB data sources.

member.name: D2D1_BLEND_DESCRIPTION.sourceBlendAlpha
member.summary: Specifies the first alpha data source and includes an optional preblend operation. Blend options that end in _COLOR are not allowed.

member.name: D2D1_BLEND_DESCRIPTION.destinationBlendAlpha
member.summary: Specifies the second alpha data source and includes an optional preblend operation. Blend options that end in _COLOR are not allowed.

member.name: D2D1_BLEND_DESCRIPTION.blendOperationAlpha
member.summary: Specifies how to combine the alpha data sources.

member.name: D2D1_BLEND_DESCRIPTION.blendFactor
member.summary: Parameters to the blend operations. The blend must use D2D1_BLEND_BLEND_FACTOR for this to be used.
